text: Viktor Josef Dammertz (8 June 1929 â€“ 2 March 2020) was a German bishop of the Roman Catholic Church. He was born in Schaephuysen, Rheurdt. He became a priest in 1957. He served as bishop of Augsburg from 1993 until his retirement in 2004. Dammertz died on 2 March 2020 in Eresing, at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German Roman Catholic bishops
title: Viktor Josef Dammertz
